name: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Iron Maiden 2nd Portable
name_original: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The Iron Maiden 2nd Portable
description: Shinseiki Evangelion: Koutetsu no Girlfriend 2nd Portable (新世紀エヴァンゲリオン 鋼鉄のガールフレンド 2nd ポータブル) is a Visual Novel video game published by CyberFront released on June 11th, 2009 for the PlayStation Portable.
